content: knit 1 round in color b ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 4 knit 4 rounds color a knit 2 rounds color b knit 3 rounds color a knit 3 rounds color b knit 2 rounds color a knit 4 rounds color b knit 1 round color a cut color a leaving a tail long enough to weave in later knit 5 rounds color b continue leg in color b until about 2 shorter than total desired leg length now you will work the fade in reverse back to color a for the heel as follows attach color a and knit 1 round in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 3 rounds in color a now you will continue the fading into your mini gusset with color b at beginning of round m1r pm knit 28 30 32 34 36 38 this is your instep pm m1l knit to end of round color b round 2 k1 sm work instep sm k1 knit to end of round color a gusset round 3 m1r knit to marker sm work instep sm knit to end of instep m1l knit to end of round color a gusset round 4 knit slipping markers as you come to them repeat gusset rounds 3 and 4 one more time in color a then gusset round 3 in color b cut color b then gusset round 4 in color a then rounds 3-4 two more times in color a until there are 6 gusset stitches on either side of instep ending with round 4 a non-increase round in color a work across instep then work a shadow wrap short row heel or any other short row heel over 28 30 32 34 36 38 st on heel side in color a follow the same instructions as above for shadow wrap heel after heel is complete having knitted one round in color a as instructed above start decreasing the gusset stitches out until back to the original stitch count while also fading back to color b as follows ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 5 color a round 1 ssk knit gusset stitches sm work instep sm knit to 2 st from end on instep k2tog color a round 2 work without decreasing knitting all stitches repeat round 1 in color a attach color b and repeat round 2 in color b repeat rounds 1-2 in color a twice repeat rounds 1-2 in color b repeat rounds 1-2 in color a this should complete your gusset decreases knit 1 round in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 1 round in color a cut color a after this round continue knitting every round in color b until 3 5 shorter than desired foot
